PHRASE.LANG: Zoom through PlayStation®Home in style with this gleaming white hoverbike. Hear the engine roar as you accelerate, and see flames and smoke coming out of the engines! Press square to go at top speed.[#Legal]

Traversez PlayStation®Home à toute allure sur cette engin volant blanc rutilant. Quand on accélère, le moteur rugit, et des flames et de la fumée jaillissent des réacteurs! Appuyez sur la touche "carré" pour atteindre la vitesse maximale.[#Legal]
Reisen Sie schneller mit diesem weißen schwebenden Motorrad. Hören Sie die Motor brüllen, wie Sie beschleunigen, und sehen Sie Flammen und Rauch aus den Motoren![#Legal]
Sfreccia con questa moto volante bianca. Senti il rombo del motore quando acceleri, e guarda le fiamme ed il fumo uscire dal motore! [#Legal]
Viaja rápidamente con esta motocicleta blanca volanda. Escucha el rugido del motor al acelerar, y ver las llamas y el humo de los motores.[#Legal]

Zoom through PlayStation®Home in style with this gleaming white hoverbike. Hear the engine roar as you accelerate, and see flames and smoke coming out of the engines! Press square to go at top speed.[#Legal]

Zoom through PlayStation®Home in style with this gleaming white hoverbike. Hear the engine roar as you accelerate, and see flames and smoke coming out of the engines! Press square to go at top speed.[#Legal]
